item.title: Open Source Software in U.S. Government
item.description: The report “Open Source Software in Government: Challenges and Opportunities” is available to the public (you can jump to the “Download full report” link at the bottom). This paper, which I co-authored, discusses key challenges and opportunities in the U.S. government application of open source software (OSS). It became publicly available only recently, even though it was finished a while back; I hope it’s been worth the wait. If you’re interested in the issues of OSS and government, I think you’ll find this report very illuminating.
